texts: We aim to respond within 10 working days.
We'll let you know if we need more information or if our reply will be delayed.

If your initial application has been successful we'll email you with next steps - don't take any further action until you hear from us. Don't make arrangements for your vehicle(s) to be scrapped until we confirm that they are eligible for the scheme.
To upload any documents that we ask for, return to the Scrappage scheme page and make another enquiry. Quote the reference number above.
